price: O mais moderado deles disse: "Não vos dissera eu: 'Que glorifiqueis a Allah'?"
arabic: قَالَ أَوۡسَطُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ لَوۡلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla awsaṭuhum alam aqul lakum lawlā tusabbiḥūna
